scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix backend && (test -f frontend/package.json && npm install --prefix frontend || echo "Skipping frontend install: frontend/package.json not found")
scripts.dev: npm run dev:backend & npm run dev:frontend
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:frontend: test -f frontend/package.json && npm run build --prefix frontend || echo "Skipping frontend build: frontend/package.json not found"
scripts.start: npm run start:backend & npm run start:frontend
scripts.start:frontend: test -f frontend/package.json && npm run start --prefix frontend || echo "Skipping frontend start: frontend/package.json not found"
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend & npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:frontend: test -f frontend/package.json && npm run lint --prefix frontend || echo "Skipping frontend lint: frontend/package.json not found"
